long_description: Inspired by special-ops forces, the high-sensitivity Garmin Tactix GPS multifunction watch boasts an altimeter, barometer, compass, waypoints and TracBac(R) navigation capability. Enjoy high-sensitivity GPS positioning with automatic calibrating altimeter, barometer and 3-axis compass. Mark and store up to 1,000 waypoints; TracBac reverses the track log so you can navigate back to your starting point. ANT+(TM) and Bluetooth(R) connectivity wirelessly shares tracks, waypoints, routes and more with other compatible Garmin devices or smartphones. Wireless sensors let you pair with optional ANT+ sensors such as heart rate monitor, temperature sensor, foot pod, or VIRB action camera (all sold separately). Sun/moon info; hunt/fish calendar; alarm clock; vibration alerts; tones; timer; stopwatch; world clock with automatic time-zone calibration. Comes preloaded with Jumpmaster software for skydivers, U.S. tide data and a worldwide basemap; plan trips and share adventures with friends using BaseCamp(TM) software. Rechargeable lithium-ion battery lasts up to 50 hrs. in GPS mode, 3 weeks in sensor mode, and 5 weeks in watch mode. Metal surfaces are coated in black to be non-reflective; scratch-resistant, curved mineral glass lens won't reflect the sun's glare; rugged forged stainless-steel rear case. The rugged and durable Garmin Tactix GPS multifunction watch resists water down to 50m (165 ft.); negative-mode LCD with green backlight allows use with night-vision goggles.
short_description: Inspired by special-ops forces, the high-sensitivity Garmin Tactix GPS multifunction watch boasts an altimeter, barometer, compass, waypoints and TracBac(R) navigation capability.
